error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 1160
His order came out to 7*200=$<<7*200=1400>>1400
So there was 1400+1000=$<<1400+1000=2400>>2400 that qualified for the discount
So his discount saved 2400*0.1=$<<2400*0.1=240>>240
So his purchase came out to 1400-240=$<<1400-240=1160>>1160
